00028 /* Define to prevent recursive inclusion -------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00029 #ifndef __HT32F5XXXX_TM_TYPE_H
00030 #define __HT32F5XXXX_TM_TYPE_H
00031 
00032 #ifdef __cplusplus
00033  extern "C" {
00034 #endif
00035 
00036 /* Includes ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00037 #include "ht32.h"
00038 
00039 /** @addtogroup HT32F5xxxx_Peripheral_Driver HT32F5xxxx Peripheral Driver
00040   * @{
00041   */

00044   * @{
00045   */

00048 /* Exported types ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00049 /** @defgroup TM_Exported_Types TM exported types
00050   * @{
00051   */
00052 /**
00053  * @brief Enumeration of TM channel.
00054  */
00055 typedef enum
00056 {
00057   TM_CH_0 = 0,                    /*!< TM channel 0                                                         */
00058   TM_CH_1,                        /*!< TM channel 1                                                         */
00059   TM_CH_2,                        /*!< TM channel 2                                                         */
00060   TM_CH_3,                        /*!< TM channel 3                                                         */
00061 #if (LIBCFG_PWM_8_CHANNEL)
00062   TM_CH_4,                        /*!< TM channel 4                                                         */
00063   TM_CH_5,                        /*!< TM channel 5                                                         */
00064   TM_CH_6,                        /*!< TM channel 6                                                         */
00065   TM_CH_7,                        /*!< TM channel 7                                                         */
00066 #endif
00067 } TM_CH_Enum;
00068 /**
00069  * @brief Enumeration of TM channel control.
00070  */
00071 typedef enum
00072 {
00073   TM_CHCTL_DISABLE = 0,           /*!< TM channel disable                                                   */
00074   TM_CHCTL_ENABLE                 /*!< TM channel enable                                                    */
00075 } TM_CHCTL_Enum;
00076 /**
00077  * @brief Enumeration of TM channel polarity.
00078  */
00079 typedef enum
00080 {
00081   TM_CHP_NONINVERTED = 0,         /*!< TM channel polarity is active high or rising edge                    */
00082   TM_CHP_INVERTED                 /*!< TM channel polarity is active low or falling edge                    */
00083 } TM_CHP_Enum;
00084 /**
00085  * @brief Enumeration of MCTM channel output idle state.
00086  */
00087 typedef enum
00088 {
00089   MCTM_OIS_LOW = 0,               /*!< MCTM channel output low when CHMOE equal to 0                        */
00090   MCTM_OIS_HIGH                   /*!< MCTM channel output high when CHMOE equal to 0                       */
00091 } MCTM_OIS_Enum;
00092 /**
00093  * @brief Enumeration of MCTM COMUS.
00094  */
00095 typedef enum
00096 {
00097   MCTM_COMUS_STIOFF = 0,            /*!< MCTM capture/compare control bits are updated by
00098                                          setting the UEV2G bit only */
00099   MCTM_COMUS_STION                  /*!< MCTM capture/compare control bits are updated by both
00100                                          setting the UEV2G bit or when a rising edge occurs on STI */
00101 } MCTM_COMUS_Enum;
00102 #if (LIBCFG_MCTM_UEV1DIS)
00103 /**
00104  * @brief Enumeration of MCTM update event1 disasble.
00105  */
00106 typedef enum
00107 {
00108   MCTM_UEV1UD = 0x00000004,                 /*!< MCTM update event 1 rquest by overflow disable control     */
00109   MCTM_UEV1OD = 0x00000008,                 /*!< MCTM update event 1 rquest by underflow disable control    */
00110 } MCTM_UEV1DIS_Enum;
00111 #endif
